QuestionJSON.Question: Spencer and their friends are working on a project to develop a fantasy football application. What steps can they take to ensure that tasks are distributed properly and the project timeline is maintained?
QuestionJSON.Answer1: Spencer assigns all tasks to themselves to ensure everything is done correctly and on time
QuestionJSON.Answer2: Spencer and their team distribute tasks according to their skills and interests, and they follow a timeline with clear deadlines
QuestionJSON.Answer3: Spencer and their team work on tasks as they come up without any specific distribution of roles
QuestionJSON.Answer4: Spencer assigns the hardest tasks to the strongest team member
QuestionJSON.Explanation: To effectively collaborate on a project, tasks should be distributed based on team members' skills and interests. A clear timeline with achievable deadlines also helps to keep the project on track. Working as a team also means recognizing and utilizing everyone's strengths, not overloading certain members with the most complex tasks.
